SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Storefront Experience: Deploy Updated User Interface Libraries

Keep your storefront current with the most recent versions of the open-source JavaScript libraries used by the B2B Commerce Visualforce pages. This release updates several libraries used for rendering components and their behaviors, and packages them in a new version of the ccrz.cc_hk_UserInterface extension class.

Where: This change applies to B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) in Lightning Experience and Salesforce Classic in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.

Why: The updated libraries include:

LIBRARY	VERSION	WHAT'S CHANGED?
accounting.js	0.4.2	Change log
backbone.js	1.3.3	Change log
backbone.paginator.js	2.0.6	No change log available
handlebars.js	4.0.11	Change log
jquery.js	3.3.1	Change log
jquery-ui-custom.js	1.12.1	Change log
jquery.hoverintent.js	1.9.0	Change log
jquery.validate.js	1.17.0	Change log
js-image-slider.js	2016.9.27	No change log available
respond.js	1.4.2	No change log available
underscore.js	1.9.1	Change log
NOTE For more details about the libraries, including licenses, see the help for JavaScript libraries in storefront pages.

How: After you upgrade the managed package, the updated libraries are available in the default implementation of the ccrz.cc_hk_UserInterface:v004 extension class. In your CC Admin storefront settings, go to the Themes section and scroll to User Interface Extension Settings. Enter cc_hk_UserInterface:v004, and save your changes.

NOTE The legacy ccrz.cc_hk_UserInterface:v003 and ccrz.cc_hk_UserInterface:v002 classes are removed. The JavaScript files previously included in the /v002 and /v003 directories of the ccrz__CCRZ_JS static resource have moved to the /v004 directory. If your extensions have referenced any files in the /v002 and /v003 directories, update those references to /v004.

This release also includes the following new libraries:

bootstrap-datepicker.js version 1.8.0
Replaces zebra_datepicker.src.js for date selection widgets.

On the Date_Format page label, update the ValueRT field with the bootstrap-datepicker.js date format for the storefront's locale. For example, use mm/dd/yyyy for the United States or dd.mm.yyyy for Germany.

jquery-migrate.js version 3.0.1
Ensures that existing jQuery code in your B2B Commerce for Visualforce solution continues to function correctly after you upgrade. Some existing jQuery code can have dependencies on functionality that has changed or been deprecated in jQuery 3.3.1.

You can also use this library to detect dependencies in your existing code that the upgrade to jQuery 3.3.1 can affect. For more information, see jQuery Migrate Plugin.

This library is required for some libraries included in ccrz.cc_hk_UserInterface:v004. If you extend ccrz.cc_hk_UserInterface:v004 and customize which libraries you include for your storefront pages, we recommend that you always include jquery-migrate.js to preserve compatibility.

SEE ALSO
